mean_cn: v. 堕落，衰减，腐化；  adj. 腐化的，颓废的，退化的，变质的；  n. 堕落者，颓废艺术
mean_en: to change to a worse state or condition :to become worse, weaker, less useful, etc.
word_etyma: de相反 + gener出生 + ate动词后缀 → degenerate 退化，堕落
sentence: How had his life degenerated to the point that he was living in a public park?
sentence_trans: 他怎么会堕落到住在公园里的地步？
